it
Interface XYValWatcher

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphFrame
public interface XYValWatcher

Classes which wish to receive notification of where the mouse cursor is in a Graph Panel have to implement this class and provide the illustrated method.

Method Summary

The method called by the GraphListener class.
Parameters:
